tha-ap393:2.2: pahaṁsitvāna mānasaṁ → sampahaṁsitva mānasaṁ (bj); sampahaṁsitvā mānasaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:17.1: Osadhañjananāḷī ca → osathaṁ añjanāpica (sya1ed, sya2ed); osadhaṁ jananāliṁ ca (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:26.3: Biḷaṅgaloṇaṁ pahūtañca → bilaṅgaloṇabhūtañca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); bilaṅgaloṇaṁ bhūtaṁ ca (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:28.4: mahesino → mahesinaṁ (si); mahāyasaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); mahissaraṁ (mr)
tha-ap393:37.2: yācittho tathāgataṁ → ayācito tathāgato (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); ayācittho tathāgataṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:40.3: Yathāsaṇṭhaṁ → yathāsantaṁ (bj); yathā saṇhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yathāsaṇhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:66.3: sumbhakaṁ → pubbakaṁ (bj); sambhataṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pupphakaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); mattikaṁ (?)
tha-ap393:80.1: yadā chāyaṁ → yadā vāyaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); yadā cāyaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:84.1: Pilindavacchanāmena → pilindivacchanāmena (bj); pilindavaccho nāmena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:86.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayissati (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr); jhāpayiṁ ahaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:89.1: Chatte ca sugate datvā → chatte sugate datvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:118.2: datvā dhammakaruttame → datvā sugate dhammakuttare (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); datvā saṅghe gaṇuttame (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:126.1: Saddhamme gādhaṁ → cetoñāṇañca (bj); saddhamme gāḷhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:145.1: Niyāmaṁ sati dhāvanti → niyāmaṁ patidhāvanti (bj); niyamaṁ paṭidhāvantī (si); niyāmaṁ paṭidhāvanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); niyamaṁ paṭidhāvanti (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:150.5: Khalitampi → khalitaṁ maṁ (si, mr); calitaṁ maṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:160.1: Dīpadhāre → dīpaṭṭhāne (bj); dīpadāne (sya1ed, sya2ed); dīpathāle (pts-vp-pli1); dīpaṭṭhāpe (mr)
tha-ap393:163.1: Sugutto → sadā gutto (bj, pts-vp-pli1); tadā gutto (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṅgutto (mr)
tha-ap393:166.1: Malaharaṇiyo → añjananāḷiyo (bj); hatthalīlaṅgake (sya1ed, sya2ed); hatthī līlaṅgake (pts-vp-pli1); hatthalilaṅgate (mr)
tha-ap393:177.2: kaṭṭissā → kaṭṭhissā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kaṭissā (sya1ed, sya2ed); kuṭṭakā (mr)
tha-ap393:182.3: uppādetvā → upanetvā (bj); upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇaṁ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṁ upadahitvāna (bj); ñāṇaṁ uppādayitvāna (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:183.3: uppādetvā → upanetvā (bj); upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇaṁ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṁ upanetvā (bj); ñāṇamupānetvā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:184.3: ñāṇaṁ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṁ upanetvā (bj); tesu ñānaṁ upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1)
